mapper.update: update t_admin set password = #{password}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, face = #{face}, education = #{education} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select d.id id, d.name name, sex, age, face, education, salary, departmentId, de.name departmentName from t_doctor d left join t_department de on(d.departmentId=de.id);

select d.id id, d.name name, sex, age, face, education, salary, departmentId, de.name departmentName from t_doctor d left join t_department de on(d.departmentId=de.id) where d.name like concat('%',#{name}, '%') order by d.id limit #{start}, #{count};
select count(id) from t_doctor where name like concat('%',#{name}, '%');
select r.*, d.name doctorName from t_record r left join t_doctor d on (r.doctorId = d.id);
select e.*, d.name name from t_extra e left join t_doctor d on(e.doctorId=d.id) where e.adminId=#{adminId} and d.name like concat('%',#{name}, '%') order by e.id limit #{start}, #{count};
mapper.insert: insert into t_extra(money, sign, reason, doctorId, adminId) values(#{money}, #{sign}, #{reason}, #{doctorId}, #{adminId});
mapper.update: update t_project set state=#{state}, adminId=#{adminId} where id=#{id};
